name: ReportMetadata

methods.name: getAggregates
methods.description: Returns unique identifiers for summary or custom summary formula fields in the report.

methods.name: getBuckets
methods.description: Returns a list of bucket fields in the report.

methods.name: getCrossFilters
methods.description: Returns information about cross filters applied to a report.

methods.name: getCurrencyCode
methods.description: Returns report currency, such as USD, EUR, or GBP, for an organization that has multicurrency enabled. The value is null if the organization does not have multicurrency enabled.

methods.name: getCustomSummaryFormula
methods.description: Returns information about custom summary formulas in a report.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the report.

methods.name: getDetailColumns
methods.description: Returns unique API names (column names) for the fields that contain detailed data. For example, the method might return the following values: “OPPORTUNITY_NAME, TYPE, LEAD_SOURCE, AMOUNT.”

methods.name: getDeveloperName
methods.description: Returns the report API name. For example, the method might return the following value: “Closed_Sales_This_Quarter.”

methods.name: getDivision
methods.signature: Note Reports that use standard filters (such as My Cases or My Team’s Accounts) show records in all divisions. These reports can’t be further limited to a specific division.
methods.description: Returns the division specified in the report.

methods.name: getGroupingsAcross
methods.description: Returns column groupings in a report.

methods.name: getGroupingsDown
methods.description: Returns row groupings for a report.

methods.name: getHasDetailRows
methods.description: Indicates whether the report has detail rows.

methods.name: getHasRecordCount
methods.description: Indicates whether the report shows the total number of records.

methods.name: getHistoricalSnapshotDates
methods.description: Returns a list of historical snapshot dates.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique report ID.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the report name.

methods.name: getReportBooleanFilter
methods.description: Returns logic to parse custom field filters. The value is null when filter logic is not specified.

methods.name: getReportFilters
methods.description: Returns a list of each custom filter in the report along with the field name, filter operator, and filter value.

methods.name: getReportFormat
methods.description: Returns the format of the report.

methods.name: getReportType
methods.description: Returns the unique API name and display name for the report type.

methods.name: getScope
methods.description: Returns the API name for the scope defined for the report. Scope values depend on the report type.

methods.name: getShowGrandTotal
methods.description: Indicates whether the report shows the grand total.

methods.name: getShowSubtotals
methods.description: Indicates whether the report shows subtotals, such as column or row totals.

methods.name: getSortBy
methods.description: Returns the list of columns on which the report is sorted. Currently, you can sort on only one column.

methods.name: getStandardDateFilter
methods.description: Returns information about the standard date filter for the report, such as the start date, end date, date range, and date field API name.

methods.name: getStandardFilters
methods.description: Returns a list of standard filters for the report.

methods.name: getTopRows
methods.description: Returns information about a row limit filter, including the number of rows returned and the sort order.

methods.name: setAggregates
methods.description: Sets unique identifiers for standard or custom summary formula fields in the report.

methods.name: setBuckets
methods.description: Creates bucket fields in a report.

methods.name: setCrossFilters
methods.description: Applies cross filters to a report.

methods.name: setCurrencyCode
methods.description: Sets the currency, such as USD, EUR, or GBP, for report summary fields in an organization that has multicurrency enabled.

methods.name: setCustomSummaryFormula
methods.description: Adds a custom summary formula to a report.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the report.

methods.name: setDetailColumns
methods.description: Sets the unique API names for the fields that contain detailed data—for example, OPPORTUNITY_NAME, TYPE, LEAD_SOURCE, or AMOUNT.

methods.name: setDeveloperName
methods.description: Sets the report API name—for example, Closed_Sales_This_Quarter.

methods.name: setDivision
methods.signature: Note Reports that use standard filters (such as My Cases or My Team’s Accounts) show records in all divisions. These reports can’t be further limited to a specific division.
methods.description: Sets the division of the report.

methods.name: setGroupingsAcross
methods.description: Sets column groupings in a report.

methods.name: setGroupingsDown
methods.description: Sets row groupings for a report.

methods.name: setHasDetailRows
methods.description: Specifies whether the report has detail rows.

methods.name: setHasRecordCount
methods.description: Specifies whether the report is configured to show the total number of records.

methods.name: setHistoricalSnapshotDates
methods.description: Sets a list of historical snapshot dates.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique report ID.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the report name.

methods.name: setReportBooleanFilter
methods.description: Sets logic to parse custom field filters.

methods.name: setReportFilters
methods.description: Sets a list of each custom filter in the report along with the field name, filter operator, and filter value.

methods.name: setReportFormat
methods.description: Sets the format of the report.

methods.name: setReportType
methods.description: Sets the unique API name and display name for the report type.

methods.name: setScope
methods.description: Sets the API name for the scope defined for the report. Scope values depend on the report type.

methods.name: setShowGrandTotal
methods.description: Specifies whether the report shows the grand total.

methods.name: setShowSubtotals
methods.description: Specifies whether the report shows subtotals, such as column or row totals.

methods.name: setSortBy
methods.description: Sets the list of columns on which the report is sorted. Currently, you can only sort on one column.

methods.name: setStandardDateFilter
methods.description: Sets the standard date filter—which includes the start date, end date, date range, and date field API name—for the report.

methods.name: setStandardFilters
methods.description: Sets one or more standard filters on the report.

methods.name: setTopRows
methods.description: Applies a row limit filter to a report.

description: Contains report metadata for a tabular, summary, or matrix
